user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Architecture Design
epics.summary: Establish foundational structure and technical stack
epics.description: Set up the project repository, configure the development environment, define the architecture and select the technology stack required for successful project implementation. Define the folder structure, module organization, and CI/CD pipeline setup to ensure scalability and maintainability of the project.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user login, logout, and registration functionality
epics.description: Develop secure user authentication and authorization features, including user registration, login, password encryption, session handling, and role-based access control. Integrate with a backend authentication service such as OAuth or JWT for a robust and secure validation process.

epics.title: Core Application Functionality Development
epics.summary: Build main product features and core workflows
epics.description: Implement the primary business logic and key features that define the application's purpose. Ensure proper CRUD operations, validations, and back-end integrations that enable end-users to perform their core tasks efficiently. Include comprehensive error handling and test coverage for core modules.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Design and develop responsive and intuitive user interfaces
epics.description: Design and develop UI components that provide a seamless, visually appealing user experience. Implement responsive layouts, consistent design elements, and accessibility features following modern UI/UX design standards. Integrate front-end frameworks such as React or Vue for dynamic interfaces.

epics.title: Data Analytics and Insights Module
epics.summary: Implement advanced data reporting and insights visualization
epics.description: Develop analytical dashboards and reporting features that transform raw data into actionable insights. Integrate analytical tools or build custom data visualization components to track user engagement, performance metrics, and system health in real-time.

epics.title: Deployment and Monitoring
epics.summary: Setup production-ready environments and monitoring tools
epics.description: Deploy the completed application to a production environment with optimized configuration. Set up monitoring tools for performance, error tracking, and uptime checks. Implement automated deployment through CI/CD workflows to ensure reliability and efficiency in future releases.

user_stories.title: Set up the project repository
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the project repository, so that I can manage the project's codebase efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The repository should support version control and collaboration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The repository is initialized and accessible to all team members.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have access to the version control system, When I initialize the repository, Then it should be accessible to all team members.

user_stories.title: Configure the development environment
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to configure the development environment, so that all team members have a consistent setup.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The environment should work on all team members' systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The environment is configured and verified to work on all systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have development tools installed, When I configure the environment, Then it should work consistently on all systems.

user_stories.title: Define the architecture and select the technology stack
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to define the architecture and select the technology stack, so that the project is scalable and maintainable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The architecture should support modular design and scalability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The architecture and technology stack are defined and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have evaluated various technologies, When I define the architecture, Then it should be documented and scalable.

user_stories.title: Implement user registration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register an account, so that I can use the application.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User details should be validated and securely stored.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register an account successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I enter valid details, When I register an account, Then it should be created successfully.

user_stories.title: Implement user login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Credentials should be validated securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can log in successfully with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I enter valid credentials, When I log in, Then I should be authenticated and logged in.

user_stories.title: Implement password encryption
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to encrypt user passwords, so that user credentials are securely stored.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Passwords should be encrypted using a strong encryption algorithm.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User passwords are encrypted before storing.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user registers, When their password is stored, Then it should be encrypted.

user_stories.title: Implement session handling
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to manage user sessions, so that user interactions are secure and tracked.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sessions should support secure storage and handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User sessions are created and managed securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user logs in, When a session is created, Then it should be managed securely.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to control access based on user roles, so that I can manage permissions effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Access should be restricted based on user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users have access based on their roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user roles are defined, When I assign roles, Then permissions should be enforced accordingly.

user_stories.title: Implement CRUD operations
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to create, read, update, and delete data, so that I can manage my information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: CRUD operations should be efficient and secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: CRUD operations are functional for all relevant data.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have data, When I perform CRUD operations, Then they should be processed accurately.

user_stories.title: Implement input validations
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to validate inputs, so that data integrity is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Input validations should prevent invalid or malicious data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Inputs are validated before processing.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user input, When I validate it, Then only valid data should be accepted.

user_stories.title: Integrate back-end systems
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate back-end systems, so that the application can function with its dependencies.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should be seamless and maintained for reliability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Back-end systems are integrated and functioning as expected.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I integrate a back-end system, Then it should function correctly with the application.

user_stories.title: Implement error handling
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement error handling, so that issues are managed gracefully.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Error handling should cover all major exceptions and provide useful feedback.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The application handles errors gracefully and provides appropriate feedback.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an error occurs, When the error is handled, Then the user should receive useful feedback.

user_stories.title: Ensure test coverage for core modules
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to ensure test coverage for core modules, so that the application remains reliable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tests should cover all critical paths and edge cases.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core modules have comprehensive test coverage.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core modules, When I run tests, Then the coverage should be comprehensive.

user_stories.title: Design responsive layouts
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want to design responsive layouts, so that the application is usable on all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Layouts should adapt to different screen sizes without compromising usability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The application layouts are responsive and functional across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different screen sizes, When I view the application, Then the layout should adapt accordingly.

user_stories.title: Implement consistent design elements
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want to implement consistent design elements, so that the user experience is cohesive.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design elements should follow a consistent style guide.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The application uses consistent design elements throughout.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the style guide, When I implement design elements, Then they should follow the guide consistently.

user_stories.title: Ensure accessibility features
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want to ensure accessibility features, so that the application is usable by everyone.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Accessibility features should comply with WCAG standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The application meets accessibility standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the accessibility standards, When I design the application, Then it should comply with the standards.

user_stories.title: Integrate front-end frameworks
user_stories.description: As a front-end developer, I want to integrate front-end frameworks, so that the application has dynamic interfaces.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Frameworks should improve development efficiency and user experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Front-end frameworks are integrated and enhance the application.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I integrate a front-end framework, Then it should provide dynamic and efficient interfaces.

user_stories.title: Develop analytical dashboards
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want to develop analytical dashboards, so that I can visualize data insights.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboards should provide real-time data visualization.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Analytical dashboards provide actionable insights.
user_stories.test_cases: Given raw data, When I view the dashboards, Then they should display real-time insights.

user_stories.title: Integrate analytical tools
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want to integrate analytical tools, so that I can enhance the application's reporting capabilities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tools should provide comprehensive data analysis and reporting features.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Analytical tools are integrated and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I integrate an analytical tool, Then it should enhance reporting capabilities.

user_stories.title: Build custom data visualization components
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want to build custom data visualization components, so that I can present insights effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Components should be customizable and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Custom data visualization components are built and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given raw data, When I use custom visualization components, Then they should present data effectively.

user_stories.title: Setup production-ready environment
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to set up a production-ready environment, so that the application can be deployed reliably.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The environment should be optimized for performance and security.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The environment is set up and tested for production use.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I set up the production environment, Then it should be ready for reliable deployment.

user_stories.title: Set up monitoring tools
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to set up monitoring tools, so that I can track performance, errors, and uptime.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Monitoring tools should provide real-time insights and alerting.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Monitoring tools are integrated and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I set up monitoring tools, Then they should provide real-time insights and alerting.

user_stories.title: Implement automated deployment through CI/CD workflows
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to implement automated deployment through CI/CD workflows, so that future releases are efficient and reliable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: CI/CD workflows should support automated, reliable deployments.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated deployment is implemented and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, When I implement CI/CD workflows, Then deployments should be automated and reliable.
